subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Jon Scheyer scored 18 points last night to help No. 18 Duke win its 21st straight against Clemson, 71-66, without any late help with the game clock.
snippet: Jon Scheyer scored 18 points last night to help No. 18 Duke win its 21st straight against Clemson, 71-66, without any late help with the game clock.
